profile.rationale: The job advertisement heavily emphasizes traditional Machine Learning tasks such as developing algorithms, classification, object detection, and specifically building a Pedestrian Dead Reckoning (PDR) model. The mentioned technologies (YOLO, OpenCV, PyTorch) are also associated with traditional ML and computer vision, not Generative AI. There is no mention of LLMs or GenAI-specific concepts. The tasks predominantly fall under Macro-Category B, with a clear focus on traditional ML, fitting the definition of an ML Specialist (Data Scientist).

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is highly specific about the technical requirements, the type of model to be developed (PDR), and the associated technologies (PyTorch, OpenCV, YOLO), all of which clearly fall under traditional Machine Learning. There is no mention of Generative AI, making the classification unambiguous.
